sentences.sContent: There is a major problem with parking in London.
sentences.sCn: 在伦敦，停车是个很大的问题。

sentences.sContent: The loss of their goalkeeper through injury was a major setback for the team.
sentences.sCn: 守门员因伤缺阵使该队的实力大打折扣。

sentences.sContent: He underwent major heart surgery recently.
sentences.sCn: 他最近做了心脏大手术。

sentences.sContent: It could have sparked a major confrontation.
sentences.sCn: 此事险些导致一场严重的冲突。

...Two major changes—satellite and Internet radio—will force radio advertisers to adapt their methods...
...We discuss here the major types of media used in advertising...
